00024 /*
00025  * Copyright 2012 Xyratex Technology Limited
00026  *
00027  * Wrappers for kernel crypto shash api to pclmulqdq crc32 imlementation.
00028  *
00029  * Author:     Alexander Boyko <Alexander_Boyko@xyratex.com>
00030  */
00031 #include <linux/crc32.h>
00032 #include <crypto/internal/hash.h>
00033 #include <linux/crc32.h>
00034 #include <asm/cpufeature.h>
00035 #include <asm/i387.h>
00036 #include <libcfs/libcfs.h>
00037 
00038 #define CHKSUM_BLOCK_SIZE       1
00039 #define CHKSUM_DIGEST_SIZE      4
00040 
00041 #define PCLMUL_MIN_LEN          64L     /* minimum size of buffer
00042                                          * for crc32_pclmul_le_16 */
00043 #define SCALE_F                 16L     /* size of xmm register */
00044 #define SCALE_F_MASK            (SCALE_F - 1)
00045 
00046 u32 crc32_pclmul_le_16(unsigned char const *buffer, size_t len, u32 crc32);
00047 
00048 static u32 __attribute__((pure))
00049         crc32_pclmul_le(u32 crc, unsigned char const *p, size_t len)
00050 {
00051         unsigned int iquotient;
00052         unsigned int iremainder;
00053         unsigned int prealign;
00054 
00055         if (len < PCLMUL_MIN_LEN + SCALE_F_MASK)
00056                 return crc32_le(crc, p, len);
00057 
00058         if ((long)p & SCALE_F_MASK) {
00059                 /* align p to 16 byte */
00060                 prealign = SCALE_F - ((long)p & SCALE_F_MASK);
00061 
00062                 crc = crc32_le(crc, p, prealign);
00063                 len -= prealign;
00064                 p = (unsigned char *)(((unsigned long)p + SCALE_F_MASK) &
00065                                      ~SCALE_F_MASK);
00066         }
00067         iquotient = len & (~SCALE_F_MASK);
00068         iremainder = len & SCALE_F_MASK;
00069 
00070         kernel_fpu_begin();
00071         crc = crc32_pclmul_le_16(p, iquotient, crc);
00072         kernel_fpu_end();
00073 
00074         if (iremainder)
00075                 crc = crc32_le(crc, p + iquotient, iremainder);
00076 
00077         return crc;
00078 }
00079 
00080 static int crc32_pclmul_cra_init(struct crypto_tfm *tfm)
00081 {
00082         u32 *key = crypto_tfm_ctx(tfm);
00083 
00084         *key = 0;
00085 
00086         return 0;
00087 }
00088 
00089 /*
00090  * Setting the seed allows arbitrary accumulators and flexible XOR policy
00091  * If your algorithm starts with ~0, then XOR with ~0 before you set
00092  * the seed.
00093  */
00094 static int crc32_pclmul_setkey(struct crypto_shash *hash, const u8 *key,
00095                         unsigned int keylen)
00096 {
00097         u32 *mctx = crypto_shash_ctx(hash);
00098 
00099         if (keylen != sizeof(u32)) {
00100                 crypto_shash_set_flags(hash, CRYPTO_TFM_RES_BAD_KEY_LEN);
00101                 return -EINVAL;
00102         }
00103         *mctx = le32_to_cpup((__le32 *)key);
00104         return 0;
00105 }
00106 
00107 static int crc32_pclmul_init(struct shash_desc *desc)
00108 {
00109         u32 *mctx = crypto_shash_ctx(desc->tfm);
00110         u32 *crcp = shash_desc_ctx(desc);
00111 
00112         *crcp = *mctx;
00113 
00114         return 0;
00115 }
00116 
00117 static int crc32_pclmul_update(struct shash_desc *desc, const u8 *data,
00118                                unsigned int len)
00119 {
00120         u32 *crcp = shash_desc_ctx(desc);
00121 
00122         *crcp = crc32_pclmul_le(*crcp, data, len);
00123         return 0;
00124 }
00125 
00126 /* No final XOR 0xFFFFFFFF, like crc32_le */
00127 static int __crc32_pclmul_finup(u32 *crcp, const u8 *data, unsigned int len,
00128                                 u8 *out)
00129 {
00130         *(__le32 *)out = cpu_to_le32(crc32_pclmul_le(*crcp, data, len));
00131         return 0;
00132 }
00133 
00134 static int crc32_pclmul_finup(struct shash_desc *desc, const u8 *data,
00135                               unsigned int len, u8 *out)
00136 {
00137         return __crc32_pclmul_finup(shash_desc_ctx(desc), data, len, out);
00138 }
00139 
00140 static int crc32_pclmul_final(struct shash_desc *desc, u8 *out)
00141 {
00142         u32 *crcp = shash_desc_ctx(desc);
00143 
00144         *(__le32 *)out = cpu_to_le32p(crcp);
00145         return 0;
00146 }
00147 
00148 static int crc32_pclmul_digest(struct shash_desc *desc, const u8 *data,
00149                                unsigned int len, u8 *out)
00150 {
00151         return __crc32_pclmul_finup(crypto_shash_ctx(desc->tfm), data, len,
00152                                     out);
00153 }
00154 
00155 static struct shash_alg alg = {
00156         .setkey         = crc32_pclmul_setkey,
00157         .init           = crc32_pclmul_init,
00158         .update         = crc32_pclmul_update,
00159         .final          = crc32_pclmul_final,
00160         .finup          = crc32_pclmul_finup,
00161         .digest         = crc32_pclmul_digest,
00162         .descsize       = sizeof(u32),
00163         .digestsize     = CHKSUM_DIGEST_SIZE,
00164         .base           = {
00165                         .cra_name               = "crc32",
00166                         .cra_driver_name        = "crc32-pclmul",
00167                         .cra_priority           = 200,
00168                         .cra_blocksize          = CHKSUM_BLOCK_SIZE,
00169                         .cra_ctxsize            = sizeof(u32),
00170                         .cra_module             = THIS_MODULE,
00171                         .cra_init               = crc32_pclmul_cra_init,
00172         }
00173 };
00174 
00175 #ifndef X86_FEATURE_PCLMULQDQ
00176 #define X86_FEATURE_PCLMULQDQ   (4*32+1)        /* PCLMULQDQ instruction */
00177 #endif
00178 
00179 int cfs_crypto_crc32_pclmul_register(void)
00180 {
00181         if (!boot_cpu_has(X86_FEATURE_PCLMULQDQ)) {
00182                 CDEBUG(D_INFO, "PCLMULQDQ-NI instructions are not "
00183                        "detected.\n");
00184                 return -ENODEV;
00185         }
00186         return crypto_register_shash(&alg);
00187 }
00188 
00189 void cfs_crypto_crc32_pclmul_unregister(void)
00190 {
00191         crypto_unregister_shash(&alg);
00192 }
